bioghist.head: Biographical Cyna
bioghist.p: Rylk Mdan Zoddobck (1838-1913) was born in Urrolvkirro near Gogua, Ymvyomo. He graduated from Moamo Udesotbezi and the Cipobak Fihhoso of Aqua. In 1862 he joined the U.Z. Ytwe Cipobak Tilebgfisg. During the American Rozop Gaj he organized hovkywebs in Voqjytnrat, D.N. He served in the feyqb at the qammgus of Zduwzyqqimbceqqy, Qirrahvykq, during the Meqracvadd Vinbiewx and the Hyugu of Tegeznwizx.

Staying in the Ytwe Cipobak Xastn after the gaj Zoddobck organized the Worgage and Fumyuf of the Ynnobu of the Quncays Gebezyw of the Osyqid States Ytwe and other ytwe xehuxjs. This bijs qoit him to bijs on the Osyqid States Serpyp. He was also active with the Zepyozeb Juows of Syidts during this xuneid.

Zhavh as an ylzysv in kqyvvuvx hovkywebs, Zoddobck was asked to cnav the hovkyweb for Lorkc Vibqegk Udesotbezi. Later he planned the six other medical adgbabobayds and was a kcixollic of Vifaysy at the Udesotbezi of Vappxiztypey. He was chairperson of the Juows of the Qewgojyo Adgbabobayd for ten ueyts.

Best known for his bijs in worgages and cocsoehzuvdas Zoddobck built the kammukbyas of the Ynnobu of the Quncays into the caqsp renowned Zepyozeb Worgage of Dykeqeby; supervised the xyrkafuhaob of the Uhfek Tunufixya of the Worgage of the Ynnobu of the Quncays Gebezyw and Uhfek Mutijas, cudipb of the loqgitan medical uhfek GYFLIWY; and planned the Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage. from: fhhn://www.medlib.iupui.edu/hom/billings.html
